snippet: Hundreds of fans and news media members flocked to a strip mall in suburban Hoover, Ala., last week for the 30th edition of SEC media days.
abstract: Marc Tracy On College Football column notes that college Southeastern Conference media day, held this year in Hoover, Ala, has become a packed free-for-all for die-hard fans; notes that hundreds of University Alabama fans showed up for event, despite fact that season does not begin for six weeks.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of fans and news media members flocked to a strip mall in suburban Hoover, Ala., last week for the 30th edition of SEC media days.

headline.seo: SEC Media Days a Magnet for College Football Fans and News Media
headline.main: Midsummer Event, Midseason Form for SEC Fans
headline.print_headline: Midsummer Event, Midseason Form for SEC Fans
